pullrequest.title: the position.world use the wrong format of include tag.

content.raw:
The file <position.world> uses the wrong format of the include tag.
-------------
The error message is showed as blow:

>Error [parser.cc:602] <include filename='...'/> is deprecated Should be <include><uri>...</uri></include

>terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::bad_alloc'

>  what():  std::bad_alloc
content.html:
The file <position.world> uses the wrong format of the include tag.

The error message is showed as blow:

Error [parser.cc:602] <include filename='...'/> is deprecated Should be <include><uri>...</uri></include

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::bad_alloc'

what(): std::bad_alloc
